summary: The Saving NOAA's Workforce Act aims to protect employees of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) from involuntary separations. It mandates a moratorium on any reduction in force and involuntary separations for NOAA employees in the competitive service, excepted service, and Senior Executive Service until full-year appropriations for fiscal year 2026 are enacted. The bill permits exceptions for separations due to misconduct, delinquency, or inefficiency.
